document_data.name: ''Leomund's Rod of Shelter''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Leomund's rod of shelter''''' was a magic [[rod]] created by the [[Archmage]] [[Leomund]] from the world of [[Oerth]].
document_data.Powers: This enchanted rod opened a portal to an impenetrable by any other means pocket dimension allowing the wielder to safely rest and recuperate even in the most dangerous of locations.
document_data.History: ''Leomund's rod of shelter'' was crafted by the creator of ''[[Leomund's tiny hut]]'', Leomund of Oerth, who wanted an easier access to secure areas to rest in following exhausting battles. By [[1372 DR]], the rod was in possession of the [[Sorceller's Encapsulate]] of [[Daggerford]].
